title: Shall I Get Karma or Karthus

replies.body: karmas a lot harder to kill imo and shes also better at 1v1 fights in lane cus the shield gives speed boost as well as being a shield (duh) plus her r+w can heal. she also has a slow and a snare so its not hard to chase enemies especially with the speed boost, where as unless you get slowed by karthus' w or hit with his ult he can be kited relatively easily so id pick karma (shes my main)
